roleset.name: remember
roleset.note: RECOLLECT-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from recollect.01-v)
RECOLLECTION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to recollect.01. VN class characterize-29.2-1-1. FN class memory. Framed by Katie. (from recollection.01-n)

example.name: SBAR
example.text: Chai Sung-lin recollects that in the early 1980s, when air conditioning was still uncommon *T*, Taiwanese men could n't bear * to keep their suit coats * on during the summer.
example.arg: that in the early 1980s, when air conditioning was still uncommon *T*, Taiwanese men could n't bear * to keep their suit coats * during the summer.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: Sometimes, when tidying up works of poetry from years before, he would come across one that he had no recollection of ever writing .
